name: Enchanted War
description:
This Project has been realised in my third year of university at Ludus Académie. 

The game was made in 2 weeks for a LevelDesign project.

Fronze war is a FPS multiplayer game with a capture the flag mode. Each team spawns in opposite positions in a symmetric map. 

To win the game they have to obtain 150 points. They obtain points in 2 ways:

1. Kill an enemi player.

2. Capture a zone tu obtain points over time.
